Nitpick, but should be either "Flat" or "Flattening", not something in between
meant to do that but english got in the way :P

Pretty sure private was removed here on accident?

                Map<EntityType, String> entityToDisplayName = ImmutableMap.<EntityType, String>builder()
          
          
            
                private Map<EntityType, String> entityToDisplayName = ImmutableMap.<EntityType, String>builder()
Removed due to the fact that interfaces cannot hold private modifiers.
Name suggestions: "Base", "Reflection", "Paper", to be less redundant, since this is all already in providers/
The module names are named as such because out of context it could be confusing
I would still suggest at least NMSReflectionProvider -> ReflectionProvider, because not all reflection will be NMS (which is the case with some code in the other open PR).
